response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,500,000 by both myself and you. This exceptional item holds significant value and can potentially bring immense benefits to your endeavors. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1250000}
